author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: عَلَى البَيانِ مِنْ أَهْلِ البَهآءِ الَّذِينَ رَكِبُوا عَلَى الفُلْكِ الحَمْرآءِ بِاسْمِكَ العَلِيِّ الأَعْلى إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ.
translation: Bless, O my God, those of the followers of the Bayán as have been numbered with the people of Bahá, who have entered within the Crimson Ark in Thy Name, the Most Exalted, the Most High. Thy might, verily, is equal to all things.
